name: Lekhnath Parajuli
title: Senior Software | Microservices Architect

summary.overview: Passionate software engineer with expertise in building scalable, high-performance applications and leading technical initiatives. Proven track record in system optimization, team leadership, and driving business growth.

bio: I'm a software engineer with a passion for building innovative solutions. With expertise in both frontend and backend development, I specialize in creating scalable applications that solve real-world problems. My current focus is on AI-powered applications and microservices architecture.
